snippet: A grand jury voted not to indict Redinel Dervishaj, who had been accused of stabbing Antonio Lacertosa, the groom-to-be.
abstract: Grand jury votes not to pursue case against Redinel Dervishaj, charged with second-degree murder in the fatal stabbing of Antonio Lacertosa outside a restaurant on Staten Island in March.
lead_paragraph: A grand jury voted not to indict Redinel Dervishaj, who had been accused of stabbing Antonio Lacertosa, the groom-to-be.

headline.seo: No Charges in Killing at Staten Island Engagement Party
headline.main: No Charges in Killing at Staten Island Engagement Party
headline.print_headline: No Charges in Killing at S.I. Engagement Party
